bibl.title: Nonnus (and Dioscorus) at the Feast: Late Antiquity and After.

series.title: Hellenica. Testi e strumenti di letteratura greca antica, medievale e umanistica.

bibl.title: Des Géants à Dionysos. Mélanges de mythologie et de poésie grecques offerts à Francis Vian
bibl.author: MacCOULL, Leslie S.B.

bibl.note: Nonnus against the background of everyday Christian life as lived in Egypt in his time.
bibl.seg: MacCOULL Leslie S.B., Nonnus (and Dioscorus) at the Feast: Late Antiquity and After.

Domenico ACCORINTI et Pierre CHUVIN (Édd.), Des Géants à Dionysos. Mélanges de mythologie et de poésie grecques offerts à Francis Vian = Hellenica. Testi e strumenti di letteratura greca antica, medievale e umanistica. 10 (Alessandria, 2003) pp. 489-500.
